product_name: Lorpen Tri-Layer Trekker C Socks - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Best suited for cold- or damp-weather hikes where chilling moisture is an issue, the Lorpen Tri-Layer Trekker socks wick moisture to keep feet comfortable on the trail.
short_description: Best suited for cold- or damp-weather hikes where chilling moisture is an issue, the Lorpen Tri-Layer Trekker socks wick moisture to keep feet comfortable on the trail.
